lst.name: sentence
lst.str: T> group net income is expected to be down 65 pct for the five months ending March 31 from the same period a year ago at around 10 billion yen, if the yendollar rate remains at the present level, managing director Tsunao Hashimoto told a press conference.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The gloomy profits and sales resulted from the yen's recent appreciation against the dollar and a sharp drop in market prices due to severe sales competition at home and abroad.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Sales of 8-mm video camera/recorders totalled 300,000 units in the three months, unchanged from a year earlier, while Beta-format video tape recorders (vtrs) sales fell to 300,000 from 350,000.
